channel.title: Chat/shout box
channel.description: I think that this has been requested before. However, I won't look down 5 pages to find it. Anyway, I really seek some anti-borednes. And NO, porn doesn't help ^^. Alright, stupid jokes aside. I seriously think that a simple chat/shout box will help bring some quick interactions. I know that you guys will have to enable rules and such. But I think it's worth it. Probably get new shout box moderators? Anyway, please tell me what you think. Is this a bad idea? Or is this a good idea that will bring more interaction into moparscape?

item.title: Chat/shout box
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

I still like the idea of a irc chat box, can just use #moparscape. channel is dead for the most part anyways.

Read full topic

item.title: Chat/shout box
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

D3i7y:

Well this would make “COMPLETE” sense to go to a chatbox. it’s not like anyone uses irc anymore. Please i don’t even chat on moparscape irc but i think an irc works just fine. i roam around freenode. EFNet there are quite a few to say the least… when i get home i will come visit all you lovely people on the irc.

“It’s not like anyone uses irc anymore”

the #mopar irc channel is more populated than the forums are at peak times, lol

Read full topic

item.title: Chat/shout box
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“KempiScape, post:68, topic:539311”]IRC should not be the only option that’s what i’m saying. Just give us users that check the forums something as well, most people don’t want to go to an external application to chat. It’s pointless then

[quote author=Pure_ link=topic=658146.msg4452968#msg4452968 date=1412809528]

I totally agree with this because the forums seem dead, this would be the perfect thing to bring some interaction

pls we’re not in 2008 anymore

Don’t give me this IRC shit, where all the cool kids come together and be cool.

Unless you want the site to exist of only cool kids in two ish years, no one will want to come here anymore
[/quote]Are you 10? Most of the people on IRC don’t even use the forums and it’s not really hard to use if you have at least one ounce of brain cells functional.

Are you 10? What? With that attitude i’m assuming you are the one who is 10, or at least act like it.

I’ve given my opinion, “Most of the people on IRC don’t even use the forums”. Do you not see what you’ve said? The cool kid club doesn’t even use the forum, yet has the highest saying on whether or not a shoutbox is good for the general people. Just no.[/quote]It’s a web applet, hardly an ‘external application’. I assumed you were 10 since you think being on IRC means you’re a “cool kid”…

Read full topic

item.title: Chat/shout box
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

Fking noob who posted above me probably hasn’t even clicked the chat button before.

Can we agree that really people just want a chat box to always be visible because they can’t be fudged to move their fat cursor to the appropriate link?

Edit: I got a better idea, rename chat to shoutbox!

Read full topic

I’ve given my opinion, “Most of the people on IRC don’t even use the forums”. Do you not see what you’ve said? The cool kid club doesn’t even use the forum, yet has the highest saying on whether or not a shoutbox is good for the general people. Just no.
